00001 package ScheatorDb;
00002 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00003 import java.sql.*;

00009 public class Matches extends DbObject {
00010 
00012     private static final String[] TABLES = {"`Match`", "`Season`", "`Team` AS home", "`Team` AS away"};
00014     private static final String[] FIELDS =
00015     {"Match.Id AS matchId",
00016      "Season.id AS seasonId",
00017      "home.name AS hometeam",
00018      "away.name AS awayteam",
00019      "match_no"};
00020 
00023     private static final String[] ID_FIELDS =
00024     { "Match.season",
00025       "Season.id",
00026       "home.id",
00027       "away.id"
00028     };
00029 
00031     private static final String[] ORDER_BY = {"match_no"};
00032     
00033     public Matches() {
00034         // Create a list with an empty Data object. The table controller
00035         // requires that there is at least one row in the table.
00036         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00037         Data m = new Data();
00038         list.put(0, m);
00039         db = new MySqlDb();
00040     }
00041 
00042     public Matches(int seasonId) {
00043         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00044         db = new MySqlDb();
00045         fetch(seasonId);
00046     }
00047 
00055     public void addNew(int match_no, String homeTeam, String awayTeam) {
00056         Data match = new Data(null, match_no, homeTeam, awayTeam);
00057         list.put(match_no, match);
00058     }
00059 
00065     public void fetch(int seasonId) {
00066         list.clear();
00067         String[] ids = {"Season.id", Integer.toString(seasonId), "Match.hometeam", "Match.awayteam"};
00068         String query;
00069 
00070         try {
00071             Statement st = db.con.createStatement();
00072             ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery(db.qe.getItems(TABLES, FIELDS, ID_FIELDS, ids, ORDER_BY));
00073             while (rs.next()) {
00074                 String matchId = rs.getString("matchId");
00075                 String sId = rs.getString("seasonId");
00076                 String home_team = rs.getString("hometeam");
00077                 String away_team = rs.getString("awayteam");
00078                 String match_no = rs.getString("match_no");
00079                 currentId = Integer.parseInt(sId);
00080                 Data team = new Data(Integer.parseInt(matchId.trim()),
00081                         Integer.parseInt(match_no.trim()),
00082                         home_team, away_team);
00083                 list.put(matchId, team);
00084             }
00085         } catch (Exception e) {
00086             System.err.println("Failed to read season data: " + e.toString());
00087         }
00088     }
00089 
00093     public class Data extends DbObject.Data {
00095         Integer field_matchNumber;
00097         String field_homeTeam;
00099         String field_awayTeam;
00100 
00101         public Data() {
00102             field_id = null;
00103             field_name = "";
00104             field_matchNumber = null;
00105             field_homeTeam = "";
00106             field_awayTeam = "";
00107             state = FieldState.NEW;
00108         }
00109         
00110         Data(Integer id, int match, String home, String away) {
00111             field_id = id;
00112             field_name = "";
00113             field_matchNumber = match;
00114             field_homeTeam = home;
00115             field_awayTeam = away;
00116         }
00117 
00118     }
